key.name: first-run
key.summary: The first time gnomeradio was run
key.description: Set to false when the user ran the first time gnomeradio

key.name: last-freq
key.description: The last frequency (in MHz) in use

key.name: device
key.description: The default radio device to use (e.g. /dev/radio0)

key.name: driver
key.description: The default device driver to use (any, v4l1 or v4l2)

key.name: mixer-device
key.description: The default mixer device to use (e.g. hw:0)

key.name: mixer-channel
key.description: The default mixer channel to use (e.g. Line)

key.name: muted
key.description: The muted state in last exited

key.name: unmute-volume
key.description: The volume before muting gnomeradio session

key.name: audio-loopback
key.description: When set to true will start an audio streaming between the radio device and the audio output device

key.name: last
key.description: The preset that was enabled when gnomeradio was terminated. Range is 0 ... (presets - 1). None is -1

key.name: destination
key.summary: The default location to use for the recorded files
key.description: The path to the location where gnomeradio should store recorded files. If that value is empty, the HOME folder will be used

key.name: profile
key.summary: The media type for encoding audio when recording
key.description: The media type for encoding audio when recording (e.g. audio/x-vorbis for Ogg Vorbis, or audio/mpeg for MP3). This is not a MIME type.
